:::{.def}

[Regular expressions](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Regular_expression) (regex or regexp) are a more powerful system than globing patterns to look for matches of a particular pattern. They are extremely useful and implemented in most programming and scripting languages.

:::

We do not have time to cover regexp in this course, but there is [an excellent site](https://www.regular-expressions.info/quickstart.html) that covers them in detail in a clear fashion.

There are many sites such as [this](https://www.regexpal.com/) that allow you to test your regexps.

If you find the syntax daunting, don't despair: any LLM (large language model) will tell you what syntax to use. We offered a webinar on this in 2023 with an early version of ChatGPT:
